alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Crane; Ector; Gaines; Glasscock; Howard; Loving; Martin; Midland; Mitchell; Reagan; Upton; Ward; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 08 at 11:30AM CDT until June 08 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Southeastern Eddy County in southeastern New Mexico... Southern Lea County in southeastern New Mexico... Glasscock County in western Texas... Andrews County in western Texas... Ward County in western Texas... Midland County in western Texas... Crane County in western Texas... Ector County in western Texas... Mitchell County in western Texas... Reagan County in western Texas... Southern Gaines County in western Texas... Winkler County in western Texas... Martin County in western Texas... Howard County in western Texas... Loving County in western Texas... Upton County in western Texas... * Until 130 PM CDT/1230 PM MDT/. * At 1130 AM CDT/1030 AM MDT/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 24 miles west of Eunice Airport to 13 miles northwest of Midland International Air and Space Port to near E.V. Spence Reservoir Near Paint Creek Recreation Area, moving southwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 47 and 228. Locations impacted include... Midland, Odessa, Hobbs, Big Spring, Andrews, Monahans, Kermit, Colorado City, Crane, Big Lake, Eunice, Jal, McCamey, Wink, Rankin, Greenwood, Garden City, Mentone, Stanton and Coahoma. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

area.areaDesc: Andrews; Crane; Ector; Gaines; Glasscock; Howard; Loving; Martin; Midland; Mitchell; Reagan; Upton; Ward; Winkler
